steps.action: Install client agent with command msiexec /i cmdextension.msi SVCENV="Test"

Steps Action Expected result Attachments 2.

Search "Add or remove programs" in the system and search for 1. Teams Machine-Wide Installer 2. Remote Desktop WebRTC Redirector Service 3. MsMmrHostMsi 4. Remote Desktop Multimedia Redirection Service 5. Microsoft Teams Record each program's [name] and [version]
Wait for 2 minutest, and check log in C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\CMDExtension\Logs\AppHealthPlugin.log
steps.expected:
TeamsAppVersion should equal to the [version] of program [name] is "Teams Machine-Wide Installer"
    if the program [name] is "Teams Machine-Wide Installer" not found
        TeamsAppVersion should equal to "NoCurrentVersionFound"

WebRTCRedirectorVersion should equal to the [version] of program [name] is "Remote Desktop WebRTC Redirector Service"
    if the program [name] is "Remote Desktop WebRTC Redirector Service" not found
        WebRTCRedirectorVersion should equal to "NoCurrentVersionFound"

MMRVersion should equal to the [version] of program [name] is "Remote Desktop Multimedia Redirection Service"
    if the program [name] is "Remote Desktop Multimedia Redirection Service" not found
        MMRVersion should equal the [version] of program [name] is "MsMmrHostMsi"
        if the program [name] is "MsMmrHostMsi" not found
            MMRVersion should equal to "NoCurrentVersionFound"

TeamsAppV2Version should equal to the [version] of program [name] is "Microsoft Teams" or "Microsoft Teams classic"
    if the program [name] is "Microsoft Teams" or "Microsoft Teams classic" not found
        TeamAppV2Version should equal to "NoCurrentVersionFound"

steps.action:
Test Cleanup:


Run command: msiexec /x cmdextension.msi
